Interface EntityCollection<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:

    public interface EntityCollection<T>
extends com.magnet.persistence.queryable.Queryable<T>

    • Method Detail

      • getBySimpleId

        T getBySimpleId(Object id)
                throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Get an Entity given the value of its id property. This is only applicable if this entity has a single id property.
        Parameters:
        id - value of the Id property.
        Returns:
        the entity with that id
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the identity has a composite identity

      • getById

        T getById(Identity<T> id)
        Get an Entity given the value of its id.
        Parameters:
        id - the identity
        Returns:
        the entity with that id

      • add

        boolean add(T entity)
        Adding an entity to the collection. This results into inserting the entity into the underlying store.
        Parameters:
        entity -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether or not it has been added.

      • remove

        boolean remove(Object entity)
        Removing an Entity from the collection, giving the whole entity. This results in deleting the entity from the underlying store as well as any of its dependent artifacts, which include collection, relationships, and owned entities.
        Parameters:
        entity -
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether or not it has been removed.

      • removeBySimpleId

        boolean removeBySimpleId(Object id)
                         throws UnsupportedOperationException
        Removing an Entity from the collection, giving the id value of entity. This results in deleting the entity from the underlying store as well as any of its dependent artifacts, which include collection, relationships, and owned entities.
        Parameters:
        id - The simple id of the entity
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether or not it has been added
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException

      • removeById

        boolean removeById(Identity<T> id)
        Removing an Entity from the collection, giving the id of the entity. This results in deleting the entity from the underlying store as well as any of its dependent artifacts, which include collection, relationships, and owned entities.
        Parameters:
        id - The simple id of the entity
        Returns:
        boolean indicating whether or not it has been added
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException
